What are we supposed to learn in this part?
• Read an image
• Use the imagematrix library
• Plan, produce, and present EDA results

Recommendations
• EDA assumes as little as possible.
• EDA should come after understanding the problem, and
before starting to model the data.
• Choose well between tables and plots; they are adequate
for different types of information.
• Be parsimonious, but also generous with your reader.
• Every table and plot must be explained in your report.

Assignment II
• Implement the densities of the 𝒦 and 𝒢0 distributions for
intensity data
• Implement random number generators for these
distributions
• Illustrate them, along with the densities of the Gamma
distribution; use with your choices of parameters:
• Plot the densities
• Plot histograms and densities
• Analyze the bright image data
• If you need help translating, use deepl.
• Check your wording, spelling, and sentence construction
with grammarly
• Produce your report as an RMarkdown file that produces a
PDF report; share only the RMarkdown file in your
repository. 3

在这部分中，我们应该学习什么？
- 读一读图片
- 使用imagematrix库
- 计划、制作和展示EDA结果

建议
- EDA的假设尽量少。
- EDA应该是在了解问题之后才来，并且
在开始建立数据模型之前。
- 在表和图之间选择好，它们足以
为不同类型的信息。
- 要简明扼要，但也要对读者慷慨解囊。
- 每一个表格和情节都必须在你的报告中做出解释。

作业二
- 实现𝒦和𝒢0分布的密度。
强度数据
- 实施随机数生成器，用于这些
分布
- 将它们与伽马射线的密度一起说明。
分布；与您选择的参数一起使用。
- 绘制密度图
- 绘制直方图和密度图。
- 分析明亮的图像数据
- 如果你需要翻译帮助，请使用 deepl。
- 检查你的用词、拼写和句子结构。
有语法的

PDF报告；只分享您的RMarkdown文件。
